titleStmt.title: A letter to Edw. Stillingfleet, D.D. &c. in answer to the epistle dedicatory before his sermon, preached at a publick ordination at St. Peter's Cornhil, March 15, 1684/5 together with some reflections upon certain letters, which Dr. Burnet wrote on the same occasion / by Simon Lowth ...
titleStmt.author: Lowth, Simon, 1630?-1720.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.L. and are to be sold by Randal Taylor ...,
